sentences.en: A review panel concluded that there were no exceptional circumstances that would warrant a lesser penalty for him.
sentences.cn: 一个评估小组作出结论：没有什么例外情况可使他获得从轻惩罚。

sentences.en: an exceptional student
sentences.cn: 出类拔萃的学生

sentences.en: At the age of five he showed exceptional talent as a musician.
sentences.cn: 他五岁时就表现出非凡的音乐才能。

sentences.en: But even so, how do they justify the additional complexity over simple buffers and ad-hoc use of other data sources in exceptional cases?
sentences.cn: 但即使这样，他们是怎样证明通过简单的缓冲来实现额外的复杂性和在例外情况下的数据源的特别使用？

sentences.en: Capital punishment is allowable only under exceptional circumstances.
sentences.cn: 只有特殊情况才允许执行死刑。

sentences.en: Christopher is a man of exceptional talent.
sentences.cn: 克里斯托弗是位具有非凡才能的人.

sentences.en: Descartes has an exceptional record in both the academic and sporting fields.
sentences.cn: 笛卡尔学校在学术和运动领域异常地保持着纪录.

sentences.en: exceptional bravery
sentences.cn: 非凡的勇气

sentences.en: Exceptional patients have the ability to throw statistics aside to say, "I can be a survivor".
sentences.cn: 尽管统计数字凿凿，仍有个别病人能够做到将它抛在一边，相信自己可以活下来。

sentences.en: He is a man of exceptional talent.
sentences.cn: 他是位具有非凡才能的人.

sentences.en: He showed exceptional musical ability.
sentences.cn: 他显示出特殊的音乐才能.

sentences.en: Its flesh has exceptional delicacies.
sentences.cn: 它的肉异常鲜美.

sentences.en: Our circumstances have been rather exceptional.
sentences.cn: 我们的情况相当特别.

sentences.en: School governors have the discretion to allow parents to withdraw pupils in exceptional circumstances.
sentences.cn: 督学可以酌情允许父母在特殊情况下让学生退学。

sentences.en: The ancient people who was successful, not only had exceptional talent but also had unflinching will.
sentences.cn: 古人立大事者, 不惟有超世之才,亦必有望忍不拔之志.

sentences.en: The flesh of this kind of fish has exceptional delicacy.
sentences.cn: 这种鱼的肉异常鲜美.

sentences.en: The young surgeon showed exceptional competence.
sentences.cn: 这位年轻的外科医生具有不寻常的才干.

sentences.en: Their technical ability is exceptional.
sentences.cn: 他们技艺超群。

sentences.en: This is an exceptional case; I’ve never seen anything like it before.
sentences.cn: 这是个不寻常的案例，我以前从没见过这样的事。

sentences.en: What he has to say is expressed in prose of exceptional lucidity and grace.
sentences.cn: 他所要说的都以极为明晰优雅的文字表达了出来。
